item.title: Thick bed of leaves in the gutter, 22nd January
item.description:
From about 21 -13 Royston Road there is a thick bed of mulched leaves in the gutters and on the pavement. With the recent heavy rainfall, the thick bed of mulched leaves is blocking the gutters and causing flooding over the pavements! This was particularly bad on Wed 20th January
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royston Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs pruning, 22nd January
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam, I am writing to report an issue regarding a tree that I believe is the responsibility of the council. The tree’s branches are overhanging into my garden, causing a significant amount of fallen leaves and general debris. In addition, the main body of the tree is pushing against my fence, and I am concerned that this pressure may result in damage or breakage of the fence if the issue is not addressed. I would be grateful if the council could arrange for an inspection and carry out any necessary pruning or maintenance to prevent further mess and potential property damage. Please let me know if you require any further information from me, such as photographs or the exact location of the tree. Thank you for your time and assistance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdene Avenue, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
